title: Onion Soup

title: Raspberry Nut Perfection(Serves 8)
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb. 6 oz.) can red raspberry or other favorite pie filling", "1/3 c. water", "1/2 pkg. white cake mix", "1 egg", "1/2 c. flaked coconut", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. melted butter"]
directions: ["Spread pie filling in bottom of 8-inch square pan.", "Combine cake mix, water and egg; beat well.", "Pour over pie filling. Sprinkle coconut and pecans on top.", "Drizzle melted butter over top.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 40 minutes.", "Serve warm."]

title: Mexican Chicken
ingredients: ["1 whole chicken", "1 chopped onion", "1/2 lb. cheese", "1/2 bag Doritos (taco flavored), crushed", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can Ro-Tel"]
directions: ["Boil chicken in water.", "Cool and cut into pieces.", "Put in a 9 x 13-inch dish.", "Place on top of chicken in following order: chopped onion, grated cheese and crushed Doritos."]
NER: ["chicken", "onion", "cheese", "Doritos", "cream of chicken soup", "cream of mushroom soup", "Ro-Tel"]

title: 10 Minute Peanut Brittle
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. light corn syrup", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 to 1 1/2 c. raw peanuts", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["In 2-quart casserole (I use 2-quart measuring cup), mix the sugar, syrup and salt.", "Microwave on High for 5 minutes.", "Stir in peanuts.", "Microwave on High for 2 to 6 minutes or until syrup and peanuts are lightly browned, stirring after every 2 minutes of cooking time.", "Stir in butter, vanilla and baking soda until light and foamy.", "Spread to 1/4-inch thickness on a large well-buttered cookie sheet.", "When cool, break into small pieces."]

title: Onion Dressing
ingredients: ["1 (14 oz.) can evaporated skim milk", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 envelope (about 1 1/2 oz.) onion soup mix", "1/3 c. catsup", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. red pepper sauce"]
directions: ["In a covered jar, shake all ingredients together well.", "Makes 2 1/2 cups dressing."]

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. cocoa", "2 c. sugar", "3 c. oats", "3/4 c. peanut butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. nuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Melt butter in saucepan.", "Add", "milk,", "cocoa", "and sugar. Stir well and boil for 1", "minute.", "Take\tfrom heat and immediately add peanut butter.", "Stir", "well.", "Add", "vanilla,\toats and nuts;\tstir well.", "Drop from teaspoon quickly onto wax paper."]

title: Pastry Crunch
ingredients: ["1 (24 oz.) vanilla flavored candy coating", "3 c. corn and rice cereal", "2 c. chow mein noodles", "2 c. small pretzel twists", "1 c. salted peanuts", "1 c. pecan pieces"]
directions: ["Place candy coating in microwave.", "Melt according to directions. Stir melted coating in remaining ingredients.", "Spread on wax paper to cool. Break into pieces and store in an airtight container."]

title: Chippewa Soup
ingredients: ["1 qt. carrots, diced", "2 qt. onions, chopped", "1 qt. celery, diced", "1 lb. green split peas", "2 qt. tomato puree", "6 cloves garlic", "1 gal. of water", "10 oz. smoked ham", "2 potatoes, diced", "1 oz. marjoram", "1 oz. basil", "1 oz. oregano", "1 oz. thyme", "4 bay leaves", "4 oz. curry powder (we use Javin Brand)", "Salt and pepper"]
directions: ["Soak the split peas overnight.", "In a large pot (preferably 3-4 gallons) heat a small amount of oil until very hot.", "Add the carrots, onions and celery and sweat the vegetables.", "Add the garlic and sweat a few more minutes.", "Add the curry powder to the vegetables and stir until curry is thoroughly mixed with the vegetables.", "Add all remaining ingredients to the pot.", "Bring this to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for approximately three hours. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper.", "Remove the bay leaves and puree the soup through a food mill or in an electric blender. Chill thoroughly.", "This is the base for Chippewa Soup.", "It should be slightly salty because it is the base and needs to be creamed before use."]

title: Coconut Cream Pie(Low Calorie)
ingredients: ["1 baked pie crust", "2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding", "1 c. coconut", "3 c. low-fat milk", "4 oz. Cool Whip (lite)"]
directions: ["Mix pudding mix with 3 cups milk. Add coconut.\tPour in baked or graham pie crust. Cover with Cool Whip. Sprinkle with toasted coconut. Keep in refrigerator."]

title: Voodoo Chicken
ingredients: ["2 1/2 lb. chicken pieces", "2 c. white vinegar", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 large onion, sliced", "4 cloves garlic, peeled and left whole", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "4 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "6 Tbsp. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. milk"]
directions: ["Mix together vinegar, soy sauce, onions, garlic and pepper. title: Chicken Divan
ingredients: ["2 whole chicken breasts", "20 oz. pkg. chopped frozen broccoli", "2 cans cream of celery soup", "1 tsp. curry powder", "2 tsp. lemon juice", "6 to 8 slices American cheese", "8 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese", "1 c. plain bread crumbs", "1/2 stick margarine"]

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 Tbsp. milk", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "4 c. flour (sifted 3 times)", "3 Tbsp. baking powder"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.", "Add milk, nutmeg and vanilla.", "Sift flour and baking powder together and combine with other mixture.", "Add enough additional flour to roll out and cut.", "Bake on ungreased cookie sheet in oven at 325\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Yield: approximately 4 dozen.", "Happy eating!"]

title: French Toast And Sauce
ingredients: ["4 eggs, beaten", "1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. frozen lemonade, thawed", "1/4 tsp. salt", "8 Tbsp. butter, divided", "8 slices day-old bread"]
directions: ["In a wide shallow bowl, beat 1st four ingredients. For each slice, melt 1 tablespoon of butter in skillet. Dip bread in egg mixture; turn and coat the other side. Cook slices in butter, browning on both sides. Serve with Sauce as follows."]

title: Spaghetti Pie

directions: ["Cook spaghetti (about 3 cups).", "Stir olive oil into hot spaghetti.", "Stir in Parmesan cheese and eggs.", "Form spaghetti mixture into a \"crust\" in a 10-inch pie plate sprayed with Pam. Spread cottage cheese over bottom of spaghetti crust."]

title: Baked Corn

directions: ["Mix all together well.", "Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0."]

title: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ["2 c. diced, cooked chicken", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. cooked rice", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1 diced onion"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together in buttered casserole dish. Sprinkle grated cheese over top of casserole.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until bubbly, at least 1 hour.", "Makes 4 to 6 servings."]

title: Favorite Chocolate Cake

title: Victorian Baked French Toast

title: Quick Swedish Meatballs

title: Irish Stew(Microwave)

Add carrots, heat on level 3 for 15 minutes until ingredients are done.", "Stir once.", "Peel and cube potatoes and add to stew.", "Blend flour and remaining water.", "Heat 5 minutes on High, or until thickened, stirring twice.", "Serves 6."]
